qa.name: Mr. Buttons
qa.appearance: Worn-out teddy bear with a missing eye

json_to_edit.voice_over: When the lights go out, that's when the magic begins.
json_to_edit.description: Mr. Buttons comes to life in Lily's room at night, leading a secret adventure.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Soft ticking clock, distant owl hoots
json_to_edit.name: Midnight Toy Adventure
json_to_edit.scene_summary: A neglected teddy bear comes to life at night, embarking on magical adventures in a child's bedroom.

qa.action: Lily's colorful bedroom bathed in soft moonlight, toys scattered around.

hf.action: Mr. Buttons' single eye blinks to life as the clock strikes midnight.

tr.action: Mr. Buttons carefully climbs down from the shelf, avoiding other sleeping toys.

xc.action: The bedroom transforms into a fantastical landscape with toy mountains and rivers.

ka.action: Mr. Buttons leads a group of awakened toys on an exciting expedition across the room.

fn.action: As dawn approaches, Mr. Buttons hurries back to his spot, winking at the camera before becoming still.

edit_command: Add a new shot after every three existing shots, but don't change anything else in the scene.

updated_json.voice_over: When the lights go out, that's when the magic begins.
updated_json.description: Mr. Buttons comes to life in Lily's room at night, leading a secret adventure.
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Soft ticking clock, distant owl hoots
updated_json.name: Midnight Toy Adventure
updated_json.scene_summary: A neglected teddy bear comes to life at night, embarking on magical adventures in a child's bedroom.

qa.action: Lily's colorful bedroom bathed in soft moonlight, toys scattered around.

hf.action: Mr. Buttons' single eye blinks to life as the clock strikes midnight.

tr.action: Mr. Buttons carefully climbs down from the shelf, avoiding other sleeping toys.

yz.sfx_keywords: gentle wind chimes, whispered toy voices
yz.action: Camera pans across the room, revealing various toys stirring and waking up, their eyes glowing softly in the moonlight.

xc.action: The bedroom transforms into a fantastical landscape with toy mountains and rivers.

ka.action: Mr. Buttons leads a group of awakened toys on an exciting expedition across the room.

fn.action: As dawn approaches, Mr. Buttons hurries back to his spot, winking at the camera before becoming still.

wx.sfx_keywords: fading magical sounds, first bird chirps
wx.action: Camera follows a trail of glitter slowly fading away as the room transitions back to normal, toys returning to their original positions.

label.rationale: we will add two new shots to the scene, one after the third shot and another after the sixth shot. this will increase the total number of shots from 6 to 8. we'll create creative and fitting shots that complement the existing scene without changing any other details. we'll also update the "number_of_shots" field and the "list_display_order" to reflect these additions.

value.sfx_keywords: gentle wind chimes, whispered toy voices

value.sfx_keywords: fading magical sounds, first bird chirps
value.action: Camera follows a trail of glitter slowly fading away as the room transitions back to normal, toys returning to their original positions.
